EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest! Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We are glad that you are open to know more about Enterprise Private Optical Networks. Rent or buy? How to handle capacity growth? Need tailored solutions? We can help you. Thank you for your request – we will be following up with you soon.
Thank you, Nokia team <[[{{my.whitepaperURL}}]]> <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201320]]>Download whitepaper <[[{{my.whitepaperURL}}]]> © 2017 Nokia.
